verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H7971>"Send<s%> <S%H582>men,<s%> that they may <S%H8446>spy<s%> out the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> which I <S%H5414>give<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> Of <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> you shall <S%H7971>send<s%> a <S%H259>man,<s%> every one a prince among <S%H5387>them.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> them from the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6290>Paran<s%> according to the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> all of them <S%H582>men<s%> who <S%H1992>were<s%> <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
These were their <S%H8034>names:<s%> Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> <S%H8051>Shammua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2139>Zaccur.<s%>
Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon,<s%> <S%H8202>Shaphat<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2753>Hori.<s%>
Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh.<s%>
Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar,<s%> <S%H3008>Igal<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph.<s%>
Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> <S%H1954>Hoshea<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun.<s%>
Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> <S%H6406>Palti<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7505>Raphu.<s%>
Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun,<s%> <S%H1427>Gaddiel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5476>Sodi.<s%>
Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> <S%H1426>Gaddi<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5485>Susi.<s%>
Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan,<s%> <S%H5988>Ammiel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1582>Gemalli.<s%>
Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H836>Asher,<s%> <S%H5639>Sethur<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4317>Michael.<s%>
Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali,<s%> <S%H5147>Nahbi<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2058>Vophsi.<s%>
Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> <S%H1345>Geuel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4352>Machi.<s%>

These are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> who <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to spy <S%H8446>out<s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H1954>Hoshea<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> them to spy <S%H8446>out<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5927>them,<s%> "Go up this way by the <S%H5045>South,<s%> and go <S%H5927>up<s%> into the hill <S%H2022>country:<s%>

and <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> what it <S%H5971>is;<s%> and the people who <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H2389>therein,<s%> whether they are strong or <S%H7504>weak,<s%> whether they are <S%H4592>few<s%> or <S%H7227>many;<s%>

and what the <S%H776>land<s%> is that they dwell <S%H3427>in,<s%> whether it is <S%H2896>good<s%> or <S%H7451>bad;<s%> and what <S%H5892>cities<s%> they are that they <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H2007>in,<s%> whether in <S%H4264>camps,<s%> or in <S%H4013>strongholds;<s%>

and what the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H8082>is,<s%> whether it is fat or <S%H7330>lean,<s%> whether there <S%H3426>is<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> <S%H2388>therein,<s%> or not. Be courageous, and <S%H3947>bring<s%> of the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%> Now the <S%H3117>time<s%> was the <S%H3117>time<s%> of the <S%H1061>first-ripe<s%> <S%H6025>grapes.<s%>"

So they went <S%H5927>up,<s%> and <S%H8446>spied<s%> out the <S%H776>land<s%> from the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6790>Zin<s%> to <S%H7340>Rehob,<s%> to the <S%H935>entrance<s%> of <S%H2574>Hamath.<s%>

They went <S%H5927>up<s%> by the <S%H5045>South,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H2275>Hebron;<s%> and <S%H289>Ahiman,<s%> <S%H8344>Sheshai,<s%> and <S%H8526>Talmai,<s%> the <S%H3211>children<s%> of <S%H6061>Anak,<s%> were <S%H2275>there.<s%> (Now Hebron was <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6814>Zoan<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>)

They <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of <S%H812>Eshcol,<s%> and cut <S%H3772>down<s%> from there a <S%H2156>branch<s%> with <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H811>cluster<s%> of <S%H6025>grapes,<s%> and they <S%H5375>bore<s%> it on a <S%H4132>staff<s%> between <S%H8147>two.<s%> They also brought some of the <S%H7416>pomegranates<s%> and <S%H8384>figs.<s%>

That <S%H4725>place<s%> was <S%H7121>called<s%> the valley <S%H182>of<s%> <S%H812>Eshcol,<s%> because <S%H182>of<s%> the <S%H811>cluster<s%> which the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> cut down from <S%H3772>there.<s%>
They <S%H7725>returned<s%> from <S%H8446>spying<s%> out the <S%H776>land<s%> at the <S%H7093>end<s%> of <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

They <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and to all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6290>Paran,<s%> to <S%H6946>Kadesh;<s%> and brought <S%H7725>back<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> to <S%H5712>them,<s%> and to all the congregation, and <S%H7200>showed<s%> them the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%>

They <S%H5608>told<s%> <S%H5608>him,<s%> and said, "We <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> where you <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H2100>us;<s%> and surely it flows with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey;<s%> and this is its <S%H6529>fruit.<s%>

<S%H657>However<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> who <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> are <S%H5794>strong,<s%> and the <S%H5892>cities<s%> are <S%H1219>fortified<s%> and <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1419>large.<s%> <S%H7200>Moreover,<s%> we saw the <S%H3211>children<s%> of Anak <S%H6061>there.<s%>

<S%H6002>Amalek<s%> <S%H3427>dwells<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H5045>South:<s%> and the <S%H2850>Hittite,<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusite,<s%> and the <S%H567>Amorite,<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the hill <S%H2022>country;<s%> and the <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%> <S%H3427>dwells<s%> by the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and along by the <S%H3027>side<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>"

<S%H3612>Caleb<s%> <S%H2013>stilled<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> before <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Let us go <S%H5927>up<s%> at <S%H5927>once,<s%> and <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H3201>it;<s%> for we are well able to overcome <S%H3201>it.<s%>"

But the <S%H582>men<s%> who went <S%H5927>up<s%> with him <S%H559>said,<s%> "We <S%H3201>aren't<s%> able to go <S%H5927>up<s%> against the <S%H5971>people;<s%> for they are stronger than <S%H2389>we.<s%>"

They brought <S%H3318>up<s%> an evil <S%H1681>report<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> which they had <S%H8446>spied<s%> out to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "The <S%H776>land,<s%> through which we have <S%H5674>gone<s%> to <S%H8446>spy<s%> it <S%H776>out,<s%> is a land that eats <S%H398>up<s%> its <S%H3427>inhabitants;<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> who we <S%H7200>saw<s%> in <S%H8432>it<s%> are <S%H582>men<s%> of great <S%H4060>stature.<s%>

There we <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H5303>Nephilim,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6061>Anak,<s%> who come of the <S%H5303>Nephilim:<s%> and we were in our own <S%H5869>sight<s%> as <S%H2284>grasshoppers,<s%> and so we were in their <S%H5869>sight.<s%>"
